item.description:
This is an outreach event. We will knock on doors and introduce people to Ron Paul's message.

On this day, we will meet at

163 Route 125
(Lovejoy Real Estate)
Barrington, NH 03825
(next door to Good and Plenty restaurant)

for a briefing and a chance to meet Jacob Hornberger, the president of the Future of Freedom Foundation and a friend of Ron Paul. Jacob will be knocking on doors with us.

Tell your friends. Jacob is a hero of the freedom movement (see this article: http://www.lewrockwel...) and he wants to help Ron Paul in New Hampshire. This event was originally posted as canvassing. We have decided to treat it as an outreach event, where we will collect information (incidental to contact with voters on the canvassing lists).

After the door-knocking, we will retire to Scott Macpherson's house in Portsmouth for pizza and socializing:

McPherson household
229 Leslie Drive
Portsmouth, NH 03801
603-294-4504
item.name: Advocacy: Meet Jacob Hornberger
